about_the_game:
Invite your guests on the most adorable stay with the Kawaii Furniture set.

Give your hotel that cheerful glow with the Kawaii Furniture set, packed with the cutest 53 items that will make any of your customers' heart melt. With its bright colors and playful patterns, life truly is all sunshine and rainbows!

Chase away your blues as you decorate your rooms with the jolly and heartwarming blend of this set. From lovable cuddly animals to heart-shaped pillows, count on a whole range of new furniture, luminaries and wall decorations to keep your guests’ heads in the clouds as they experience a stay straight out of a daydream. Be a real home design sweetheart and let your disarming personality pop out.

The Kawaii Furniture Set contains the following DLC:

- 2 beds
- 2 chairs
- 2 armchairs
- 2 tables
- 2 dressers
- 2 wardrobes
- 2 coffee tables
- 2 shelves
- 2 sofas
- 2 carpets
- 2 wall lamps
- 2 ceiling lamps
- 2 standing lamps
- 17 standing decorations
- 10 wallpapers

package_groups.title: Buy Hotel Renovator - Kawaii Furniture Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: AMD FX-4300 X4 / Intel Core i3-4130
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 / Geforce GTX 750 Ti - 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 30 FPS, 1920x1080 in low.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1500 X / Intel Core i7-6700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 / GTX 1070 Ti - 8 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS, 1920x1080 in epic.

short_description: Give your hotel that youthful glow with the Kawaii Furniture set, packed with the cutest 53 items that will make any of your customers' heart melt. With its bright colors and playful patterns, life truly is all sunshine and rainbows!
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Polish, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Ukrainian, German, French, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
